title: Air Fryer Italian Sausages, Peppers, and Onions

Ingredients.2: 1 small red bell pepper, thinly sliced

Ingredients.3: 1 small yellow bell pepper, thinly sliced

Ingredients.4: 1 small orange bell pepper, thinly sliced

Directions.1: Preheat the air fryer to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C).

Directions.2: Cut onions in half from root to stem; cut each half into thirds. Combine onions and bell peppers in a medium bowl. Add olive oil, Italian seasoning, salt, and pepper; toss to combine. Transfer vegetables into the air fryer basket and set the sausage links on top without touching one another.

Directions.3: Air fry for 15 minutes. Turn sausages and air fry for another 10 minutes.

Directions.4: Place each sausage in a bun and top with vegetables and provolone cheese.
